|brand = Arris |model = TG3462 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (S/CE) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC3800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UIDTG3482ER |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;FHCE2712;Puma 7; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 2.0 GHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Quantenna;QT10GU; |cpu2_cores = 2 |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML04G200TFI00; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;; |flash2size = 128 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = 4 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 256 |ram2chip = Nanya;NT5CC64M16GP-EK; |ram2_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |cm_down_c = 32 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F8:A0:97 |oui = F8:A0:97
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 115 |pwr_ac_hz = 60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1.5 |pwr_conn = C7P
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.1, MoCA 2.0, ZigBee, Thread, Bluetooth LE, battery backup, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/12/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Quantenna;QT10GU; |rad1chip2 = Quantenna;QT7810C; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 8 |rad1rxchains = 8 |rad1sstreams = 8 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 3464 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Quantenna;QT10GU; |rad2chip2 = Quantenna;QT6210B; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 2x 192MHz OFDM in the downstream and 2x 96MHz OFDMA :in the upstream along with 32x8 channel bonding.
"Multi Processor Technology with ARM and ATOM based Application Processor"
===Variants=== *'''TG3462''' - DOCSIS 3.1 Telephony Gateway for North America :(DOCSIS 3.0 32x8, 8x8 802.11ac Wave 2 MU-MIMO) *'''TG3462S/CE''' - DOCSIS 3.1 Telephony Gateway for Europe :(EuroDOCSIS3.0 32x8, 4x4 802.11ac Wave 2 MU-MIMO)
==Links of Interest== [https://www.arris.com/globalassets/resources/data-sheets/touchston-tg3462-data-sheet.pdf Datasheet]
==See also== [[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] â€¢ [http://www.arris.com/products/docsis-3.1-broadband-devices/ DOCSIS 3.1 Broadband Devices] *[[Arris TG3442]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi *[[Arris TG3452]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0 *[[Arris TG3462]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 8x8 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Zigbee & BT *[[Arris TG3482ER]] - ''Touchstone Wireless Telephony Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 8x8 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Zigbee & BT<!-- Same specs, may be the same device --> *[[Arris DG3450]] - ''Touchstone Cable Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0
